readable.title: 514905846_b54d13946a
readable.content: A boy in a shirt and tie jumps off a staircase . A child , wearing a tie , jumps off steps . A young boy in dress clothes and a tie is jumping in the air . Boy in white dress shirt , black slacks , tie and sneakers jumping down from steps near yellow flowers . The young boy with nice pants , a belt , and a tie is jumping off the steps
